testCases.label: returns length of array (size 5)
testCases.description: Verifies that getLengthOfArray returns the correct length when given an array of 5 elements.

testCases.label: returns length of array (size 3)
testCases.description: Verifies that getLengthOfArray returns the correct length when given an array of 3 elements.

testCases.label: gets element at index 2 from array
testCases.description: Checks that getNthElementOfArray returns the value at index 2 (7) from the array {8,4,7,3,8,5}.

testCases.label: gets element at index 0 from array
testCases.description: Checks that getNthElementOfArray returns the first element (5) from the array {5,3,9,1,0} when n is 0.

testCases.label: gets element at index 2 from small array
testCases.description: Checks that getNthElementOfArray returns the value at index 2 (8) from the array {6,4,8}.

testCases.label: sets element at index 2 in array
testCases.description: Verifies that setNthElementOfArray updates the value at index 2 to 5 in the array {9,3,7,3,6}.

testCases.label: sets element at index 0 in array
testCases.description: Verifies that setNthElementOfArray updates the value at index 0 to 2 in the array {9,3,4}.

testCases.label: creates new array of given size (5)
testCases.description: Ensures that returnNewArraySizeN(5) returns a non-null array whose length is exactly 5.

testCases.label: creates new array of given size (2)
testCases.description: Ensures that returnNewArraySizeN(2) returns a non-null array whose length is exactly 2.
